General.Name: COWELL FASHION Co.Ltd
General.Description: COWELL FASHION Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells lifestyle products in South Korea and internationally. The company offers underwear, golf and sports apparel, and luxury products, as well as shoes. It provides its products through online and offline distribution channels. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea. COWELL FASHION Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Dae Myung Chemical Co., Ltd.
General.Address: PDC A Building, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13487
